name: Full Stack dapp Workshop with Scaffold-ETH and The Graph
description:
Want to learn to build a dapp quickly and easily? This is the workshop for you! We will setup and build a dapp from scratch using Scaffold-ETH 2 and The Graph. 

Scaffold-ETH has everything you need to get started quickly.
- NextJS
- Rainbow Kit
- Wagmi
- and more...

If you want to follow along please install nodeJs, yarn package manager, git and docker. See you there!

speakers.name: Kevin Jones
speakers.bio:
Developer Relations Engineer @ Edge & Node, working on The Graph
Buidler @ Buidl Guidl, working on Scaffold-ETH
